translations: n.手术，军事行动（Operation, 非正式）
abbr.（OP）观测所（Observation Post）；绝版（Out of Print）；有机磷酸酯（organophosphate）；道明会（Order of Preachers）

sentences.sentence: I'm going in for my op on Monday.
sentences.translation: 星期一我要住院动手术。

sentences.sentence: He always shopped at the co-op.
The co-op sells the art work at exhibitions.
sentences.translation: 合作社在展览会上出售艺术品。
